formalpara.title: Figure 3. Preparing Macrocarriers.
formalpara.para: (A) Drying macrocarriers after dipping in ethanol. (B) Pipetting DNA-coated gold particles onto macrocarriers. (C) Drying DNA-coated gold particles on macrocarriers. Note that gold particles are centered over holes in macrocarrier holder. (D) Pressing tool used to firmly seat macrocarriers in macrocarrier holders. Apply pressure while using a twisting motion to firmly seat the macrocarriers such that they remain in place when carrier is inverted.
